name: souvenirs (post jam)
description:
KEYBOARD CONTROLS ! CLICK INSIDE THE GAME VIEWPORT TO ACTIVATE INPUTS ! (else it wont work eh)

= = Controls = =

- Use [E], [Spacebar] or [RightArrow] to skip text - Use [Arrows] when you have to make a choice - Type answers with your keyboard when the games asks you to do so (you'll see a "_" symbol on the bottom half on the viewport when you can write answers)

= =

[Ludum Dare 46 - Post Jam version]

"As time flows by, memories fade. I made this little “game” to make you remember all these little moments, to keep these memories alive."

The game asks questions about your past, and you must answer to these questions by typing them with your keyboard. The game tries to push you in your answers to make you remember details about the events and the persons involved.

= = 

This version is the post-jam update of the game.

The changes compared the old version are:
- 4 more dialogue subjects (8 instad of 4)
- Typewritter sound changed and greatly reduced
- Removed the "auto-sizing" of the text
- Skipping a statement now instantly draws it (instead of just speeding up its appearance)
- Corrected a bug that prevented the first characters typed to be recieved by the game when typing answers

If for some reason you want to see the "jam version" of the game, you can find it here: https://soaren.itch.io/souvenirs
